questions.question:
Answer the questions given below (refer Fig.1):


Fig. 1 Circuit diagram of three-phase bridge inverter


1. What are the full forms of CSI and VSI?

answers.a: Constant source Inverter and Variable Source Inverter
answers.b: Constant Source Inverter and Voltage Source Inverter
answers.c: Current Source Inverter and Variable Source Inverter
answers.d: Current Source Inverter and Voltage Source Inverter

questions.question: 2. How many switches in three phase inverter are in “ON” state simultaneously?
3. In the sinusoidal pulse width modulation, select the correct carrier signal
4. In sinusoidal pulse width modulation, the comparator output is high when the

answers.a: triangular wave has magnitude higher than the sinusoidal wave
answers.b: sinusoidal wave has magnitude higher than triangular wave
answers.c: triangular wave has magnitude equal to the sinusoidal wave

questions.question: 5. Which of the following switches should NOT be turned ON simultaneously?
